<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

## SignatureDropImpl class

Setup a collection of NFTs where when it comes to minting, you can authorize some external party to mint tokens on your contract, and specify what exactly will be minted by that external party..

## Example

```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/sdk";

const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK("{{chainName}}");
const contract = sdk.getSignatureDrop("{{contract_address}}");
```

| Method                                                                                                       | Modifiers | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

| [burn(tokenId)](./sdk.signaturedropimpl.burn.md)                                                             |           | Burn a single NFT                                                                                                                                                                                                     |

| [claimTo(destinationAddress, quantity, options)](./sdk.signaturedropimpl.claimto.md)                         |           | Claim unique NFTs to a specific Wallet                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [createBatch(metadatas, options)](./sdk.signaturedropimpl.createbatch.md)                                    |           | Create a batch of unique NFTs to be claimed in the future                                                                                                                                                             |

| [getAllClaimed(queryParams)](./sdk.signaturedropimpl.getallclaimed.md)                                       |           | Get All Claimed NFTs                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [getAllUnclaimed(queryParams)](./sdk.signaturedropimpl.getallunclaimed.md)                                   |           | Get All Unclaimed NFTs                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [getClaimTransaction(destinationAddress, quantity, options)](./sdk.signaturedropimpl.getclaimtransaction.md) |           | Construct a claim transaction without executing it. This is useful for estimating the gas cost of a claim transaction, overriding transaction options and having fine grained control over the transaction execution. |
| [isTransferRestricted()](./sdk.signaturedropimpl.istransferrestricted.md)                                    |           | Get whether users can transfer NFTs from this contract                                                                                                                                                                |
| [totalClaimedSupply()](./sdk.signaturedropimpl.totalclaimedsupply.md)                                        |           | Get the claimed supply                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [totalSupply()](./sdk.signaturedropimpl.totalsupply.md)                                                      |           | Get the total count NFTs in this drop contract, both claimed and unclaimed                                                                                                                                            |
| [totalUnclaimedSupply()](./sdk.signaturedropimpl.totalunclaimedsupply.md)                                    |           | Get the unclaimed supply                                                                                                                                                                                              |
